content: Hi folks! I'm interested in Chalk and want to contribute to it. I've read a few blog posts about Chalk, and thought I want to learn rather by code. Is there any issue I can pick up, or anything I can do?
good timing, @tirr-c, we're in the process of start our next "sprint", which means we're blocking out various issues and places to get involved
nice! can I get involved in planning, or do I have to wait until planning is done?
